statements: SELECT * FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, average_score FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE completed_lectures = true;
SELECT course_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE completed_lectures = false ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, average_score FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, student_name, average_score FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE completed_lectures = TRUE ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE average_score >= 80;
SELECT student_name, completed_lectures FROM StudentAnalysis WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE department = 'Science';
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT course_name, instructor, department FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.grade_level = c.course_id WHERE s.age > 18 AND c.start_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade = 'A';

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id ORDER BY student_name DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT grade, grade_date FROM grades WHERE course_id = 101 AND student_id = 201;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name FROM instructors ORDER BY instructor_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grades.grade = 'A'
SELECT instructor_name, course_name FROM instructors INNER JOIN courses ON instructors.instructor_id = courses.instructor_id WHERE instructor_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students LEFT JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grades.grade IS NULL
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM Assignments WHERE due_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC, student_id ASC, enrollment_date
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 3
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade = 'A'
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM Assignments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY due_date ASC
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score, MIN(score) AS min_score, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM Grades
